subject: Yields Of The Week: July 26 - August 1 2025
body:
Welcome to _Yields of the Week_! Every Friday, we spotlight the top DeFi yields across the crypto landscape, focusing on opportunities that are not just the highest APYs but also sustainable and unique opportunities. Whether you're new to DeFi or a seasoned degen, our goal is to help you navigate the yield farming space with confidence. Let’s dive into this week’s picks!

———————————————————————————

### **Please read the web version of this post as it will get cut short in email format!**

This is never a recommendation or endorsement to buy any token(s) mentioned, and here’s a few risks to consider:

* Smart contract risk in any underlying protocols

* Pool size and liquidity depth

* Front-end spoof attack on an app frontend

* An economic design exploit

* Colluding signers on any multisig

* Systemic risk across DeFi, including stablecoin depegs



This Will Get Cutoff In Email - Click Here To Read Online (https://www.the-edge.xyz/p/yields-of-the-week-july-26-august-1-2025?jwt_token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJzdWJzY3JpYmVyX2lkIjoiNDlmMTk0NTktY2ZjMS00N2I0LWE5MGItNzdlN2VlMjE1NzI5IiwicHVibGljYXRpb25faWQiOiI3OTJmOTI0YS1lZjYwLTQyNWItYjFiZi02YmM4YmY4NGYxZjIiLCJleHAiOjE3NTQyMzg4MTksImlzcyI6Imh0dHBzOi8vYXBwLmJlZWhpaXYuY29tIiwiaWF0IjoxNzU0MDY2MDE5fQ.j160i9rEogT4euu3uyal9xvdkfmrT22PKTdNuQGez0g)

## **Stablecoin Yields**

Here’s the top yielding **stablecoin** vaults **(non-boosted)** for the past 7 days according to [Vaults.fyi](http://Vaults.fyi): 

View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/6a7a36d5-e2ef-4f32-8266-92be558cffd6/Screenshot_2025-07-31_142125.png?t=1753996908)
Caption: Min $5M in TVL

_The link to this filtered table above is _[_here_](https://analytics.vaults.fyi/vaults?excludeRewards=true&tvlLowerBound=5000000&selectedTokens=AUSD&selectedTokens=BOLD&selectedTokens=DAI&selectedTokens=DOLA&selectedTokens=FRAX&selectedTokens=GHO&selectedTokens=GUSD&selectedTokens=LUSD&selectedTokens=MAI&selectedTokens=PYUSD&selectedTokens=RLUSD&selectedTokens=TUSD&selectedTokens=USD0&selectedTokens=USD0%2B%2B&selectedTokens=USD1&selectedTokens=USDA&selectedTokens=USDC&selectedTokens=USDC.e&selectedTokens=USDM&selectedTokens=USDP&selectedTokens=USDQ&selectedTokens=USDS&selectedTokens=USDT&selectedTokens=USDX&selectedTokens=USDbC&selectedTokens=USDe&selectedTokens=USDtb&selectedTokens=USD%E2%82%AE&selectedTokens=USD%E2%82%AE0&selectedTokens=USN&selectedTokens=USR&selectedTokens=WXDAI&selectedTokens=YU&selectedTokens=YUSD&selectedTokens=cUSD&selectedTokens=crvUSD&selectedTokens=eUSD&selectedTokens=eUSDe&selectedTokens=lvlUSD&selectedTokens=mkUSD&selectedTokens=rUSD&selectedTokens=sBOLD&selectedTokens=sDAI&selectedTokens=sDOLA&selectedTokens=sUSD&selectedTokens=sUSDC&selectedTokens=sUSDS&selectedTokens=sUSDX&selectedTokens=sUSDe&selectedTokens=sUSDf&selectedTokens=srUSD&selectedTokens=verUSDC&selectedTokens=wM&selectedTokens=wUSDL&selectedTokens=wstUSR&selectedTokens=iUSD)_ _

———————————————————————————

**Bonus: **I’ve written up [Avant Protocol](https://app.avantprotocol.com/products) lots now, but they just launched a new product and the yields are wild!

This new product is a junior tranche called **avUSDx** which is basically savUSD's yield boosted Junior Tranche. It’s currently yielding **50% APY.**

_(*Junior Tranche experiences first loss in event of exploit, hack or other loss events. Always be mindful of the added risk/reward here.)_

OK all that was confusing, here’s their products mapped out:

View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/3176ba64-4f4f-4c79-a886-6e4013566d57/image.png?t=1753999495)
Caption: 

If you want to read up on more of this it’s all here in their [docs](https://docs.avantprotocol.com/).

It’s a pretty impressive suite they are building here (including the avBTC side at **7.11% APY**)

View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/ca1d4071-2737-4819-a02d-374421d77c3d/Screenshot_2025-07-31_150206.png?t=1753999574)
Caption: 

———————————————————————————

**Bonus:** I wrote about this [Hyperbeat](https://app.hyperbeat.org/vaults/usdt) yield last week, but their [USDT vault](https://app.hyperbeat.org/vaults/usdt) is still very solid. It’s currently yielding **~17.23% APY**: 

View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/4c6cb2b8-043f-45a4-aabb-f7b1901a5b87/Screenshot_2025-07-31_142649.png?t=1753997224)
Caption: It’s come down slightly since last week (19.83%), but still very high with over $90M in TVL.

———————————————————————————

## **ETH & BTC Yields**

Here’s the top yielding **ETH** vaults **(non-boosted)** for the past 7 days according to [Vaults.fyi](http://Vaults.fyi): 

View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/593328f0-3623-4abd-9d56-b5898101aa26/Screenshot_2025-07-31_153152.png?t=1754001136)
Caption: Min $5M in TVL

_The link to this filtered table above is _[_here _](https://analytics.vaults.fyi/vaults?tvlLowerBound=5000000&selectedTokens=ETH&selectedTokens=WETH&selectedTokens=agETH&selectedTokens=cbETH&selectedTokens=ezETH&selectedTokens=frxETH&selectedTokens=mETH&selectedTokens=msETH&selectedTokens=pufETH&selectedTokens=pxETH&selectedTokens=rETH&selectedTokens=rsETH&selectedTokens=rswETH&selectedTokens=stETH&selectedTokens=swETH&selectedTokens=tETH&selectedTokens=weETH&selectedTokens=weETHs&selectedTokens=wstETH&selectedTokens=wsuperOETHb&selectedTokens=ynETHx&selectedTokens=osETH&excludeRewards=true)

———————————————————————————

Here’s the top yielding **BTC** vaults **(non-boosted)** for the past 7 days according to [Vaults.fyi](http://Vaults.fyi):

Caption: Min $5M in TVL

_The link to this filtered table above is _[_here_](https://analytics.vaults.fyi/vaults?tvlLowerBound=5000000&excludeRewards=true&selectedTokens=agETH&selectedTokens=mETH&selectedTokens=rswETH&selectedTokens=weETHs&selectedTokens=BTCB&selectedTokens=LBTC&selectedTokens=SolvBTC&selectedTokens=WBTC&selectedTokens=cbBTC&selectedTokens=eBTC&selectedTokens=tBTC)_ _

———————————————————————————

**Bonus: **[Maple ](https://app.maple.finance/earn?referral=Mig0gHP59IYC)continues its ascension as one of the juggernauts of DeFi. They’ve been offering some of the most consistently high yields on BTC since February 2025. They’ve been able to generate a **5.13% APY** on $180M worth of BTC. It’s pretty impressive to see those kinds of yields at scale. 

They’re now opening this product up to accredited investors and institutional investors. If you want to read up more on this you can at the link below:

BTC Yield: Now Live on Maple: (https://maple.finance/insights/btc-yield-now-live)

Also, for anyone who is earning Maple “Drips”, Edge readers get an extra multiplier that can be fairly material:

View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/41d62a13-66ea-4bf7-a7cb-daf9e7e2cc3b/image.png?t=1754003919)
Caption: 

If you want a to earn this multiplier click the button below:

Maple Drips Boost (https://app.maple.finance/earn?referral=Mig0gHP59IYC)

## **What I’m Doing On HyperEVM**

**So far I’ve:**

1. Staked all my HYPE on [Kinetiq ](https://kinetiq.xyz/)and converted to kHYPE (usable in DeFi) which yields **2.2%.**

2. Moved all of my kHYPE to [Felix](https://www.usefelix.xyz/) where I’ve deposited into the vanilla vault and am borrowing HYPE against my kHYPE collateral (paying a hefty **12% borrow rate**).

3. Taking my borrowed HYPE and staking it again for kHYPE and depositing into the [Kinetiq Veda vault](https://kinetiq.xyz/earn) that’s farming **6% APY** + airdrop rewards from other protocols.

4. I’ve since deposited into Hyperbeats beHYPE as I’m quite bullish on them and this vault has a ton of points. If you’re not up to speed on this opportunity, this is a great thread from last week.

5. More continued in “Yield Trading” just below

## **Yield Trading**

View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/94b81997-a6c6-445f-8702-dd562899bc2d/GxGp01YasAAHX2o.jpg?t=1754005586)
Caption: It’s here!

I kid you not, Kinetiq and Hyperbeat going live on [Pendle ](https://www.pendle.finance/)this past Wednesday felt like Christmas morning to me (I really need to get out more - I’m aware).

The ones I’m looking at are Kinetiq’s kHYPE YT and Hyperbeat liquidHYPE YT:

View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/d654e525-9b53-4f35-b025-9df16c712c45/Screenshot_2025-08-01_084018.png?t=1754062888)
Caption: 

The intern himself wrote up some great analysis on kHYPE to try to figure out the upside here. There was one small error though as kHYPE releases 800k points per week and I had to correct the master himself:

View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/d3323c49-8e64-4849-bf38-bb5eb61a05ea/Screenshot_2025-08-01_084520.png?t=1754063148)
Caption: 

Here’s Intern’s full writeup - [Click Here](https://x.com/PendleIntern/status/1951124897801052439)

(note - Implied Yield was actually quite high when he wrote this up so numbers could look a bit better now)

**ALPHA **🚨 

Kinetiq, like Hyperliquid, is only releasing a set amount of points per week (800k), meaning, rewards are front loaded to early participants. Therefore, if you are going to do YTs it makes sense to be positioned early.

———————————————————————————

I’m currently in the Hyperbeat early deposit vault but I feel like I missed the best entry on the liquidHYPE YTs. I’m keeping an eye on them for an entry, but again, these made a lot of sense to be early on. Why you ask? Your rewards are proportionate to your share of the vault based on your own TVL in the vault. The vault was only a little over ½ full when YTs launched so there have been days when you were getting close to double the hearts (points).

View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/d0db2526-2469-498a-86f8-04815cf921a2/image.png?t=1754065161)
Caption: Still only ¾ full which means extra points for people currently in

Stephen from DeFi Dojo did an incredible writeup on this YT opportunity -[ Click Here](https://x.com/phtevenstrong/status/1950542796571455735)

———————————————————————————

Here’s what the top yield markets on [Pendle ](https://www.pendle.finance/)look like across Stables, BTC and ETH:

**Stables**

View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/bd4161f4-f1f7-4f3f-97b5-0f3c192760ba/Screenshot_2025-08-01_081834.png?t=1754061569)
Caption: 16.28% - 18.79%

**BTC**

View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/0391a4c4-0e64-4d51-96d0-75be30f3d9ba/Screenshot_2025-08-01_081918.png?t=1754061584)
Caption: 2.13% - 4.16%

**ETH**

View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/81effa67-4476-4345-a8ad-69b238ab46c9/Screenshot_2025-08-01_081856.png?t=1754061597)
Caption: 4.38% - 6.44%

———————————————————————————

## **Leverage Looping Yields**

_Looping can be a very effective leverage strategy to earn more yield, but one must be cautious to monitor borrowing rates, and liquidations which are a necessary cost to generate such leveraged yields (we don’t recommend max leverage). It’s also important to know if you’re going after points or real yield when looping._

[Gearbox ](https://gearbox.fi/)is back and providing leverage products for [Falcon](https://app.falcon.finance/?r=0ec4ccafcd94a7756710278ebfd7dd4b).

Check out these yields.

**73% - 163% APRs** 👀 

Tweet:  (https://twitter.com/GearboxProtocol/status/1951221729348690070)

The Edge actually has the highest possible referral for Falcon where you earn an extra 15% in their “Miles” rewards campaign:

Click Here For 15% Boost on Falcon miles (https://app.falcon.finance?r=0ec4ccafcd94a7756710278ebfd7dd4b)

———————————————————————————

The Aavethena team have joined forces once again to create a product they are calling Liquid Leverage. 

One of the problems they are trying to solve for is:

“Partners enabling Liquid Leverage provides a solution to a key issue that sUSDe users faced in the past: the 7-day unstaking cooldown for sUSDe.

While at least half of a user's position will be still in sUSDe, the USDe component allows for the risk of the position to be managed more effectively.“ — - Ethena

More on this in their full announcement:

Tweet:  (https://twitter.com/ethena_labs/status/1950194502192550149)

The Post-Loop APR from their image below shows **49.89% APR**. 

View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/88f0f339-329c-4ee8-9a17-6d698c6688de/GxB7l7WbEAAlfZj.jpg?t=1753998225)
Caption: 

That’s all for now, thanks for checking it out!
